name: ADIP 2019 Asia Digial Image Processing Conference in Kobe, Japan
content: Conference official website：http://www.adip.org Meeting time：December 21-23, 2019\. Meeting place：Kobe, Japan. Host unit：ACM Singapore Chapter. keynote speaker： Prof. Kaoru HIROTA, Tokyo Institute of Technology, Japan; Prof. Ma Maode, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore; Prof. Chiharu Ishii, Hosei University, Japan. Published by： 1\. ADIP 2019 is supported by ACM Singapore Chapter. 2\. Accepted papers will be published in the Conference Proceedings by ACM, which is indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, etc. and to be submitted and reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (CPCI). Call for Papers： Image acquisition. Image processing. Medical image processing. Pattern recognition and analysis. Visualization. Image coding and compression. Super-resolution imaging. Image segmentation. Face recognition. Adaptive and Clustering Algorithms. Discrete Cosine Transforms. Discrete Hilbert Transforms. Array Signal Processing. Digital Signal Processing. Statistical Signal Processing. Adaptive Signal Processing. Multidimensional Signal Processing. Mobile Signal Processing. Important Dates Deadline (full text) :August 10, 2019\. Deadline (abstract) :September 1, 2019\. Registration Deadline:September 20, 2019\. Conference Contact :Ms Jane Jiang mailbox: adip@acm-sg.org
